name: Gargoyle
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the gargoyle remains motion less, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.
